name: Wiwi Rush
description:
Wiwi Rush is the sorting cat game you didn't know you needed. Sort the cats based on their gender before their pee timer is up and become a certified "gendist"!

Features:
* Another cat game! 
* Intuitive swipe controls!
* Frustrating gameplay!
* Hundreds of cats!
* Pee Bars!
* 3 Unique Lifelines!
* Gender Issues!
* Cats in costumes!
* Meet Dr. Carlo!

Wiwi Rush has two game modes for you to choose from:

** RUSH MODE - This mode will test your memory and reflexes! Remember the outfits of the cats to determine their gender and make sure you sort them before their pee timer runs out! 

** MATCH MODE - Intuition, luck, and lifelines will help you sort the cats in this mode as you will need to determine the gender by looking at the sorter's thoughts

-------
This game was developed within a period of 1 week (Sept 22-Sept 29, 2017)
This game was made as an entry to GDAPs Game On 2017 contest.
